players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. Let's be cautious and make sure we're all working together to figure out what happened."
Diana: "I agree with Alice. Let's focus on gathering information and be cautious in our actions to ensure we don't make any hasty decisions."

Diana: "I'd like to suggest that we all share any information or suspicions we may have, no matter how small. Let's work together and keep an open mind as we try to uncover the truth behind Bob's death."
